channel.title: Getting killed at green drags gives u 5 pkp?
channel.description: title says it all. if you get killed by a green dragon in the wildy, u get 5 pkp. how do i fix?

item.title: Getting killed at green drags gives u 5 pkp?
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

zach55200:

Look for [quote]o.pkPoints + 10[/quote] in [quote]playerassistant.java[/quote] , hopefully you can find the line of code where it gives you pkp for killing the dragon. Once found just remove it.

thats just my code for giving pkp to someone when they kill a personâ€¦

Read full topic
item.source: Getting killed at green drags gives u 5 pkp?

item.title: Getting killed at green drags gives u 5 pkp?

in

, hopefully you can find the line of code where it gives you pkp for killing the dragon. Once found just remove it.
